seo: ShowDoc,任意文件上传漏洞,漏洞检测,PageController.class.php
seo_en: ShowDoc, arbitrary file upload vulnerability, vulnerability detection, PageController.class.php
summary: 该插件用于检测ShowDoc应用中的PageController.class.php任意文件上传漏洞，攻击者可能通过此漏洞上传恶意文件控制服务器。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect the arbitrary file upload vulnerability in ShowDoc's PageController.class.php. Attackers may exploit this vulnerability to upload malicious files and take control of the server.
